meanings.sent1: I had to retype my essay because I made a mistake.
meanings.sent2: She decided to retype the document to make it look neater.
meanings.sent3: After spilling coffee on the keyboard, he had to retype the entire report.
meanings.sent4: The student's computer froze, forcing her to retype her entire assignment from memory.
meanings.sent5: He had to retype the email three times before it finally sent correctly.

meanings.sent1: Please retype the password to confirm it is correct.
meanings.sent2: He had to retype the address on the envelope because of a mistake.
meanings.sent3: The cat walked across the keyboard, causing him to retype the message.
meanings.sent4: She had to retype the phone number multiple times to memorize it.
meanings.sent5: The teacher asked the student to retype the paragraph for better clarity.
